arts.ttl: Grealish resurgence: Toffees hold on against Wolves as star continues fine form
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers took on Everton in a Premier League game on Saturday at Molineux, and here Sports Mole looks at the highlights and stats from the clash.

arts.ttl: Two more assists for Grealish as Everton hold on to beat Wolves
arts.sum: Jack Grealish provided two more assists as Everton held on to beat Wolves 3-2 at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Jack Grealish shines again as Everton take three points at Wolves
arts.sum: The on-loan Manchester City winger created goals for Beto and Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall to make it four assists already this season.

arts.ttl: Marshall Munetsi reveals Wolves' gameplan for Everton clash
arts.sum: He continues: “We’ve got to try and put a lot of pressure on them, because if we start very well, as you’ve seen in the last game at home, we did push a lot when we played West Ham in the cup game. Marshall Munetsi has been a fixture of Vitor Pereira’s starting lineup so far this season.

arts.sum: Vitor Pereira says Jorgen Strand Larsen has a small injury ahead of Everton game However, manager Vitor Pereira has shared a worrying message ahead of Saturday’s game against Everton.

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Everton – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Wolves and Everton meet at Molineux on Saturday, each seeking momentum as the Premier League season settles. Vítor Pereira’s Wolves are still without a point after two defeats, but a dramatic midweek cup win has injected some optimism. arts.sum: Everton travel to Molineux on Saturday aiming to make it three consecutive victories in all competitions.
